member.name: M:IFramework.AspNet.RegExp.IsIdentityCard(System.String)
member.summary: 是否是身份证号，验证以下3种情况: 1、身份证号码为15位数字； 2、身份证号码为18位数字； 3、身份证号码为17位数字+1个字母

member.name: T:IFramework.AspNet.Swagger.SwaggerDefaultValues
member.summary: Represents the Swagger/Swashbuckle operation filter used to document the implicit API version parameter.
member.remarks: This is only required due to bugs in the . Once they are fixed and published, this class can be removed.

member.param: The operation to apply the filter to.
